snippet: Five Broadway newcomers in the “Bring It On: The Musical” cast discuss their first roles, their fears and the roles they would love to play.
abstract: Broadway newcomers Taylor Louderman, Adrienne Warren, Ryann Redmond, Nicolas Womack and Elle McLemore, who are currently part of cast of Bring It On: The Musical, discuss their first roles, their fears and the roles they would love to play.
lead_paragraph: Five Broadway newcomers in the “Bring It On: The Musical” cast discuss their first roles, their fears and the roles they would love to play.

headline.seo: ‘Bring It On: The Musical’ and Its Broadway Newcomers
